jcr:content.jcr:title: List of subcamps of KZ Herzogenbusch

contentheadline.headline: List of subcamps of KZ Herzogenbusch

contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=March 2013}} Below is the '''list of subcamps of [[Herzogenbusch]]''' complex (Konzentrationslager Herzogenbusch) of [[Nazi concentration camps]], in Dutch known as ''Kamp [[Vught]]''. #[[Kamp Amersfoort|Amersfoort]] or Polizeiliches Durchgangslager Amersfoort #[[Arnhem]] #[[Breda]] #[[Eindhoven]] #[[Gilze-Rijen]] #[[Haaren, North Brabant|Haaren]] #[[Herzogenbusch]] #[[Leeuwarden]] #[[Moerdijk]] #[[Roosendaal]] #[['s Gravenhage]] #[[Sint-Michielsgestel]] #[[Valkenburg aan de Geul|Valkenburg]] #[[Venlo]] #[[Zutphen]] ==See also== *[[List of Nazi-German concentration camps]] ==External links== * [http://www.kampamersfoort.nl/ Kamp Amersfoort] official website, in Dutch, English and Polish *[http://www.zuidenwind.nl/films/index.php?taal=en&type=1&id=27 Documentary film about Konzentrationslager Herzogenbusch] {{DEFAULTSORT:Herzogenbusch}} [[Category:Herzogenbusch concentration camp]] [[Category:Nazi SS]] [[Category:Nazi concentration camps in the Netherlands|Herzogenbusch]] [[Category:20th century in Germany]] [[Category:The Holocaust in the Netherlands|Herzogenbusch]] {{Holocaust-stub}}
